info.title: OPERA Cloud Inventory API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Inventory functionality in OPERA Cloud. This includes sell limits for date ranges, viewing and updating the properties inventory, as well as item inventory (such as rollaways, microwaves etc.).

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 22.3.

get.description:
You can use this API to retrieve Block inventory for a specified hotel. Narrow down your results using the query parameters available.

OperationId:getBlockInventoryStatistics

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel where block inventory statistics are searched.

parameters.name: includeBlocksWithNoRoom
parameters.description: If set to true, includes business blocks without rooms.

parameters.name: includeOverbooking
parameters.description: If set to true, the house overbooking limit for each day is added to the total number of physical rooms.

parameters.name: includeOpportunities
parameters.description: If set to true, the results will include opportunities. If this flag is not provided it will be considered false and exclude opportunities.

parameters.name: includeTentativeInventory
parameters.description: If set to true, includes non-deduct business blocks and group reservations in the Sales Allowance Available Rooms and House Availability statistics.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: endDateRange
parameters.description: The ending value of the date range.

parameters.name: startDateRange
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: summarySortByCode
parameters.description: Supported block inventory statistical sorting.

parameters.name: detailSortByCode
parameters.description: Supported block inventory statistical sorting.

parameters.name: fetchInstructions
parameters.description: Type for block inventory statistics instructions that can be used in requests for partial operations.

200.description: Response object for information regarding Block Inventory Statistics.

get.description:
You can use this API to retrieve the inventory for a specified hotel. Narrow down your results using the query parameters such as a date range, room type, room class, and/or tentative inventory included.

OperationId:getHotelInventory

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel where hotel inventory is searched.

parameters.name: roomCountRequested
parameters.description: Number of rooms requested.

parameters.name: includeTentativeInventory
parameters.description: If set to true, includes non-deduct/Tentative rooms for a date range.

parameters.name: dailyInventory
parameters.description: If false minimum inventory for the date range is requested, otherwise inventory is requested for every day.

parameters.name: houseLevel
parameters.description: Indicates that House level inventory is requested.

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: Room Type Code.

parameters.name: roomClasses
parameters.description: Room Class Code.

200.description: A response for Hotel Inventories meeting the search criteria. Returns inventory classified on room type, class and house level for a given property.

get.description:
This will fetch a hotels inventory statistics for a specified date range that you can provided in the request.

OperationId:getInventoryStatistics

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel where inventory statistics are searched.

parameters.name: dateRangeEnd
parameters.description: The ending value of the date range.

parameters.name: reportCode
parameters.description: Identifies the type of statistics collected. Each ReportCode corresponds to a set of category summaries based upon a predetermined agreement.

parameters.name: dateRangeStart
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: parameterName
parameters.description: Name of the parameter.

parameters.name: parameterValue
parameters.description: Value of the parameter.

200.description: Object that holds the details of inventory Statistics.

get.description:
This will fetch a hotels Item inventory for a specified date range that you can provided in the request.

OperationId:getItemInventory

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the hotel where item inventory is searched.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End Time of the Time window.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start Time of the Time window.

parameters.name: itemClass
parameters.description: Item Class to filter the Items/Item Pools in the response.

parameters.name: defaultDuration
parameters.description: Define the default duration in days when booking the item.

parameters.name: fixedCharge
parameters.description: If true indicates that item has fixed charge when it is attached to a reservation.

parameters.name: outsideStay
parameters.description: If true indicates that item could be held outside of the reservation stay days.

parameters.name: requiredForBooking
parameters.description: If true indicates that item is required for the reservation.

parameters.name: sellInEvent
parameters.description: If true indicates that item can be sold in event.

parameters.name: sellInReservation
parameters.description: If true indicates that item can be sold in reservation.

parameters.name: sellSeparate
parameters.description: If true indicates that item is allowed to sell separately.

parameters.name: welcomeOffer
parameters.description: When set to true will only return items that are Welcome Offer Eligible.

200.description: Return object to the request for information regarding items inventory/availability.

post.description:
Use this API to hold Item Inventory.

parameters.name: hotelId

parameters.name: holdItemInventory
parameters.description: Request object for holding an items inventory/availability.
